name: Ubuntu Launcher
body:
Ubuntu Launcher is still a work in progress, and can be found [on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=be.robinj.ubuntu).
If Beta isn't bleeding-edge enough for you, you are free to join [the Google+ community](https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/111207292310016778258), after which you can use [this link](https://play.google.com/apps/testing/be.robinj.ubuntu) to opt-in for alpha-testing. You should then be able to get the latest alpha version through Google Play.
Feedback and bug reports are always welcome on GitHub (preferably), the Google+ community or [via e-mail](mailto:android-dev@robinj.be).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
